title: Remedies to be liberally administered
context: ยง490:1-305 Remedies to be liberally administered. (a) The remedies provided by this chapter shall be liberally administered so that the aggrieved party is put in as good a position as if the other party had fully performed but neither consequential or special damages nor penal damages may be had except as specifically provided in this chapter or by other rule of law. (b) Any right or obligation declared by this chapter is enforceable by action unless the provision declaring it specifies a different and limited effect. [L 2004, c 162, pt of ยง1]
